#Rolling Stones on Spotify

This would be my introduction.

## Popularity and live

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(readr)

rs <- read.csv("Data/rolling_stones.csv")


```

Least popular songs
```{r}
least_populare <- rs %>%
  filter(song_popularity>0) %>%
  arrange(song_popularity) %>%
  head(1) %>%
  select(song_name) %>%
  pull(song_name)
```

The least popular song is: `r least_populare`.

Most popular songs
```{r}
rs %>%
  arrange(song_popularity) %>%
  tail(3) %>%
  select(song_name,song_popularity)
```
